artist: André Thomkins; Karl Gerstner; Daniel Spoeri; Galerie der Spiegel
creditline: Transfer from the MIA Research and Reference Library; The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund, 1969
description: black clamshell box containing cardboard with ten hexagonal cards printed with words in German, French and English in purple, blue and red; cards attached to backing with metal bolts
medium: Artist's multiple; offset lithography on cardboard and paper, metal bolts, wood, cloth over cardboard, ribbon
provenance: All of the multiples were acquired in 1969 by the MIA Research and Reference Library through the John Russell Van Derlip Library Fund.
signed: on inner spine, in black: [André Thompkins]
title: Dogmat Mot
